posts.title: 试试各种媒体
posts.text: 夜空中最亮的星-逃跑计划 蔡依林全新暖心单曲《幸福路上》11月20日温情上线：

posts.title: 第八章
posts.text: 上善若水。水善利万物而不争，处众人之所恶，故几于道矣。居善地；心善渊；与善仁；言善信；正善治；事善能；动善时。夫唯不争，故无尤。 人力无为。人意争万物而不让，取万物之所善，故几于盗矣。居福地，心魔渊，与伪善，言伪信，政自治，事利能，动善时。夫无不争，故深尤。

posts.title: Hello TingTing
posts.text: Welcome to my site! This is my very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
